original: simpl. rewrite <- Nat.add_assoc. rewrite (Nat.add_comm (binomial n p)). rewrite (Nat.add_comm (binomial n p) (binomial n p)). rewrite <- Nat.add_assoc. rewrite <- (Nat.add_assoc (binomial n p) (binomial n p) (binomial n (S p))). rewrite (Nat.add_comm (binomial n p) (binomial n (S p))). rewrite (Nat.add_comm (binomial n p)). reflexivity.
